entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 11:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -17.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -21.0°C
Wind: W 25 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Blowing snow this evening. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then to 20 after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
